body_html: FYI, the --data_format flag we added is able to handle this appropriately on my end for both the MNIST model and the ResNet ImageNet model. I can resume training and/or evaluate on the same checkpoint even if I swap the data_format value. Let me know if you are having any issues @183amir; otherwise closing this.

body: FYI, the `--data_format` flag we added is able to handle this appropriately on my end for both the MNIST model and the ResNet ImageNet model. I can resume training and/or evaluate on the same checkpoint even if I swap the `data_format` value. Let me know if you are having any issues @183amir; otherwise closing this.
